sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"和谐，一致"之意。
means: harmony ： 指人与人之间或不同部分与整体之间完全协调、和谐、愉快，没有摩擦。
agreement ： 侧重态度与观点上的一致。
concord ： 多指人际、国家间或民族之间协调一致的关系。
unity ： 指各个成员、各群体之间相互协调一致的关系。
accord ： 指思想一致，彼此不矛盾，也指行动上的一致。

sentence.Network_en: As they smiled at each other, harmony was restored again.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们彼此微笑的时候，又恢复了往日的和睦。

sentence.Network_en: the need to be in harmony with our environment
sentence.Network_cn: 同我们的环境协调的必要

sentence.Network_en: The new agreement raised hopes for conditions of prosperity and harmony.
sentence.Network_cn: 新的协议唤起了人们对繁荣与和谐前景的期望.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 符文之语_百度百科 ... Grief（ 悔恨） Harmony（ 和谐（harmony）） Ice（ 冰冻）.
和声是指两个以上的音同时发响，就是和声(Harmony)。如二部和声、三部和声等。
生日花_百度百科 ... 炫耀（ Showy） 协调（harmony）（ Harmony） 艺术（ Art）.
和字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 和美〖 harmoniousandhappy〗 和睦〖 harmony;concord;amity〗 和暖〖 pleasantlywarm〗.

list.abs: 和两会有关的英文单词_百度知道 ... monetary policy 货币政策 social harmony 社会和谐 mutual support 相互支持.
英语单词翻译 ... careful consideration 深思熟虑 perfect harmony 水乳交融 feed on fancies 画饼充饥/画梅止渴.
首页 - 温州市规划局 ... 六城联创 Six City Linkage 和谐社会 Harmonious Society 科学发展 Scientific Development.
元旦大合唱曲目_张老师_新浪博客 ... forever friends( 永远的朋友) in harmony( 和谐无间).

derivation.yuyuan_name: late middle English: via Old French from Latin harmonia 'joining, concord', from Greek, from harmos 'joint'

encyclopedia.content: Apache Harmony是Apache软件基金会的Java SE项目。 这个项目的目标是营造一个大型的、健康的社区，这个社区由那些对运行是平台感兴趣的人组成。他们的任务是完成： 一个兼容的、独立的Java SE 5 JDK的实现，并根据Apache License v2发布； 一个由社区开发的模块化的运行时（包括java虚拟机和类库）体系结构。 该项目期望支持尽可能多的不同平台。一个特定的平台是否被支持，主要取决于参与者能在这个平台上定期运行测试、报告编译

entry.def: If people are living in harmony with each other, they are living together peacefully rather than fighting or arguing.

example.ex: We must try to live in peace and harmony with ourselves and those around us...
example.tran: 我们必须努力和我们自己及周围的人和睦相处。

example.ex: He projected himself as the protector of national unity and harmony.
example.tran: 他把自己标榜成民族团结与和睦的捍卫者。

entry.def: Harmony is the pleasant combination of different notes of music played at the same time.

entry.tran: （各组成部分的）协调，和谐，调和
entry.def: The harmony of something is the way in which its parts are combined into a pleasant arrangement.

example.ex: He looked more relaxed, as if some of the harmony from his surroundings had flowed into him.
example.tran: 他看起来放松了些，仿佛周围的和谐环境感染了他。

means.word_mean: 2. the structure of music with respect to the composition and progression of chords
3. a harmonious state of things in general and of their properties (as of colors and sounds); congruity of parts with one another and with the whole

auth_sentence.content: Where there is discord, may we bring harmony.
auth_sentence.res_content: Where there is discord, may we bring harmony.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Where there is discord, may we bring harmony.

auth_sentence.content: Then there will be peace and harmony in Tibet.
auth_sentence.res_content: Then there will be peace and harmony in Tibet.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Then there will be peace and harmony in Tibet.

auth_sentence.content: Disparity in years...is not invariably a bar to harmony.
auth_sentence.res_content: Disparity in years...is not invariably a bar to harmony.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Disparity in years...is not invariably a bar to harmony.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"人或小东西",常带有嬉谑性或爱称; 2. 表名词,加在形容词或r结尾的单词后,通常表示为"状态,性质等"; 3. 表形容词,加在名词后,表示"……的"

stems_affixes.word_buile: fat肥大的+y人或小东西→fatty胖子
daint+y状态,性质等→n.精美食品 adj.娇美的,挑剔的
craze狂热+y……的→crazy疯狂的
fault犯错误+y……的→adj.有过失的,有缺点的
flint极硬的东西,燧石+y……的→adj.极坚硬的
greed贪欲,贪婪+y……的→adj.贪吃的,贪婪的,渴望的
guilt罪行,内疚+y……的→adj.犯罪的,有罪的,心虚的
hill小山,丘陵+y……的→adj.多小山的;丘陵起伏的
rain雨+y……的→adj.下雨的,多雨的
sleep睡+y……的→adj.想睡的;寂静的
stead=stand站+y……的→adj.稳固的,稳定的
wind风+y……的→adj.多风的,刮风的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 多树木的,木本的,木头般的,木制的

dog狗+y人或小东西→doggy小狗
fat肥大的+y人或小东西→fatty胖子
gran奶奶+y人或小东西→granny
kit猫+y人或小东西→kitty小猫
miss小姐,姑娘+y人或小东西→n.少女,小姑娘
old老的+y人或小东西→n.老人,陈旧之物

stems_affixes.value_cn: 矮子,特别短的东西[尤指衣,裤]
stems_affixes.word_buile: short短的+y人或小东西→矮子
batter接连重击+y状态,性质等→殴打
daint+y状态,性质等→n.精美食品 adj.娇美的,挑剔的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 投递,送交;交付,交货;分娩
stems_affixes.word_buile: deliver递送+y状态,性质等→投递,送交
difficult困难的+y状态,性质等→n.困难,困境,难题
discover发现,发觉+y状态,性质等→n.发现;被发现的事物
flatter阿谀,奉承+y状态,性质等→n.谄媚,阿谀,巴结,奉承
harmon+y状态,性质等→n.协调,融洽
inquire打听,询问+y状态,性质等→n.[enquiry]询问,打听,调查
jealous嫉妒的+y状态,性质等→n.妒忌,嫉妒,猜忌

stems_affixes.value_cn: 控制权,统治权;精通,掌握
stems_affixes.word_buile: master掌握+y状态,性质等→n.控制权,统治权;精通,掌握
recover恢复,痊愈+y状态,性质等→n.恢复,痊愈,防御

Sentence.sentence: They are built in harmony with the environment.
Five ways to find harmony with the natural world Walk: Break the rhythm of permanently being under a roof
The five suggestions the author gives at the end of the passage are meant to encourage people to seek harmony with the natural world

means.word_mean: 和睦, 融洽, 一致; 和谐, 协调

sentences.en: The couple lives in perfect harmony.
sentences.cn: 这对夫妇和睦地生活着。

sentences.en: There was perfect harmony between the two brothers.
sentences.cn: 兄弟俩的感情非常融洽。

sentences.en: His ideas were no longer in harmony with ours.
sentences.cn: 他同我们的想法不再一致了。

sentences.en: The harmony of sea and sky makes a beautiful picture.
sentences.cn: 海天一色构成一幅美丽的图画。

jushi.english: The couple live in perfect harmony.
jushi.chinese: 这对夫妇和睦地生活着。

jushi.english: The harmony of sea and sky makes a beautiful picture.
jushi.chinese: 海天一色构成一幅美丽的图画。

jushi.english: There was perfect harmony between the two brothers.
